results.description:
## Apple Rewind 2011 Germany: Best iPad travel app ##

Travel the world from wherever you are and watch webcams worldwide with an elegant, friendly, and intuitive user interface.

WorldView+ puts the world into your pocket or onto your couch! Watch over 20,000 webcams from all over the world and get additional information for each place such as current weather or Wikipedia articles.

Press Quotes:
"Want to check the weather in Covent Garden, or indeed see the pyramids? WorldView opens your eyes." - The Times Online
"It's an ideal toy for tourists wishing to get a sense of the weather at their destinations, or for armchair travelers stuck in their work cubicles." - USA Today Online
"If you like webcams, you'll really enjoy WorldView's features and design." - TUAW

Feature Overview:
- Save your favorite webcams and even group them into your own collections
- iCloud support! Automatically syncs your favorites.
- Add additional webcams manually
- View images in fullscreen with the best image quality provided by the webcam
- WorldView+ automatically updates the image as soon as most webcams provide them
- Share webcams and images on Twitter, Facebook, and via email

Find webcams:
- Type in text and search or select any of the suggested locations
- Search using map, tap and hold on a place to search around a specific spot
- Watch webcams near your current location
- Get lucky and view random webcams
- Browse a list of new, recently viewed, and featured webcams
- All webcams listed in http://webcams.travel/ are available

More than just webcams:
- Current weather information near the webcams location
- Wikipedia articles around the webcams location
- View webcam locations on a map
- View daylight images
- Get a live video stream when possible
- See a timelapse video of selected webcams
- Visit the webcam's website on webcams.travel

Add more yourself:
- Easily add webcams not listed in webcams.travel


WorldView+ – browse and discover the world like never before.


Technical info:
- Manually added webcams support password protection via HTTP basic authorization
- Supports most webcam types providing images via JPG and PNG and video streams using Motion-JPEG
- Auto updating images is technically not possible for all webcams, currently supported for more than 9,000
- Live video streams are available for more than 900 webcams, audio is not supported
- Timelapse videos are provided by webcams.travel for about 50 webcams as of now


If there are any questions or problems, please visit our support forum at http://support.worldviewmobileapp.com/. This will allow us to help sort out any issues you may be experiencing. Thanks and happy WorldViewing!
results.releaseNotes:
- Improvements to iCloud sync
- Improved swedish & croatian localizations
- Fix import bookmarks from WorldView by webcams.travel (Requires version 4.1.2 of both apps)
- Improved handling of corrupted iCloud data. (Can require second app start to fix it)
- Improved stability
- Various minor improvements
